resources.string:
Sample camera application from www.androiddevblog.net
A sample camera applicaiton to demonstrate the use of camera effects.

For more infromation please visit:
http://www.androiddevblog.net
This is a sample application to detect face(s) from a bitmap\n\nClick on the \'Take Picture\' to take a picture using Camera and detect the face(s) in the picture taken.
